name: 蒼葉
message: "You are absolutely not okay. You look like crap and you can't even stand straight."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear?"
Clear is staring at his feet, clutching his arm.
The air around us has grown even more humid. Raindrops begin to fall on my cheeks.

name: クリア
message: "...I'm sorry. I didn't want to get you involved, Master..."
Clear's voice is so weak that the sound of the rain almost drowns it out.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Who were those guys back there? They both had your face."

name: クリア
message: "They're..."
Clear doesn't continue.
The rain gradually grows louder.

name: クリア
message: "...Master. You've noticed already, haven't you? That I'm not human."

name: クリア
message: "I'm an artificial lifeform. I have a model and a serial number. Just like those two."
...The thought has occurred to me that Clear might not be human.
And seeing those sparks fly out of his arm... pretty much confirmed it.
But there's something about hearing him say it....

name: クリア
message: "We were built by Toue. So they were technically correct when they said that Toue is our master. Also..."

name: クリア
message: "I believe you're already familiar with Toue's research into mind control. Well, we were created as part of that research."

name: クリア
message: "You heard one of them singing Dye Music earlier. We were designed with that ability."

name: クリア
message: "It's functionally similar to your voice, Master. Ours is artificial, of course."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, does that mean your song is...?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. But the song I sang just now counteracts Dye Music."

name: クリア
message: "Of course, I can sing Dye Music as well."

name: クリア
message: "...I'm sure you can't trust me now."
Clear looks away sadly. Rain runs down his cheeks.
It beats down on my head too, sucking the heat from my body.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...So you've been hiding this the whole time?"

name: クリア
message: "No. You may not believe me... but I honestly forgot."

name: クリア
message: "Though, I guess it's really more that I never had any reason to remember."

name: クリア
message: "I never needed to... but when they contacted me... when I saw them... it hit me."

name: クリア
message: "It finally hit me that I was one of them."

name: クリア
message: "From your perspective, I was made by your enemy."

name: クリア
message: "I might even be a spy or something. I can't blame you for wondering. But―"

name: クリア
message: "I decided to tell you this knowing you would have doubts. I wanted you to know I wasn't hiding anything."
Water dripping from his hair, Clear looks at me again.
His eyes shine with resolve in the darkness.

name: クリア
message: "Your voice is how I knew you were my master. Like ours, like Toue's, your voice has the power to control minds..."

name: クリア
message: "But unlike yours, our powers were created artificially."

name: クリア
message: "It's really strange, you know? How different are we really? You're human, but your voice has the same power as ours. Does that make us the same?"

name: クリア
message: "You answered my questions before. All my questions. You gave me answers I'd never considered before."

name: クリア
message: "You gave me so many new thoughts and ideas, just like my Grandpa did."

name: クリア
message: "When I learn new things, it makes it feel like the world has gotten brighter, and it makes me want to learn more―to spend more time with you."

name: クリア
message: "So, here's the conclusion I've come to. You are of course human, Master, and I am an android..."

name: クリア
message: "But my desire to be with you is real. And maybe my 'true' master really is Toue..."

name: クリア
message: "...but as far as I'm concerned, my only master is you."

name: クリア
message: "My feelings on that matter haven't changed, even now that I remember what I am. Those two said I was broken, but I don't care."

name: クリア
message: "I've never tried to trick you. I'm not trying now."

name: クリア
message: "If I can convince you to believe anything... please believe that."
...With a sorrowful echo, his last few words vanish into the rain.
I find myself clutching the front of my jacket. It hurts to see him like that.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't shocked to hear that Clear was created by Toue.
Clear's fears are not unfounded. The thought that he might be deceiving me has crossed my mind.
But... no. I can't believe that.
If there's any part of his story I doubt, it's that he's artificial at all. He just looks so human, standing there in the rain, spilling his guts to me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear, you're so stupid."

name: クリア
message: "Master..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Do you really think I'm that heartless?"
Clear frowns, biting his lip.
Then, as if struck by a sudden inspiration, he rummages through his pockets.
After a moment, he pulls out... an umbrella.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah!"

name: クリア
message: "You'll catch cold, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haha."
I have to laugh a little. It's just so... like him.
He opens the umbrella and offers it to me. Even now, he's still thinking of me first.
He really is the Clear I know.
